name: Space Radiance
description: Space Radiance it's arcade game with rpg system. Protect green glow against physical objects using a variety of improvements.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2Ghz or better Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: 64 MB video card - GeForce (tm) 3 or higher or ATI(R) Radeon 8500 or higher (except GeForce4 MX) DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 140 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
